baseline_groups.claim_summary: Wages are negatively related to the unemployment rate (negative wage-unemployment semi-elasticity), controlling for individual, industry-year, and occupation-year fixed effects.
baseline_groups.notes: Table 2 columns 1-5 progressively add controls. Col 4 (full controls + mismatch interactions) is the primary specification: coef=-0.0044 (p<0.001).

global_notes: Paper studies wage cyclicality using NLSY79 panel data. The analysis uses simulated data due to data access constraints. The five Table 2 columns form a control progression. Specifications with only individual FE show positive coefficients (wrong sign), highlighting the importance of industry-year and occupation-year FE.
